description: MADHURI RUIA is a top nutritionist, Pilates expert, fitness author and founder of Integym. ‘Never give up on your own or another’s fitness’ is Madhuri’s mantra; it helps her find innovative ways to make people fit whether it is by overcoming obesity, beating diabetes or losing those last few impossible-to-lose kilos.
name: Madhuri Ruia
